tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wearable_device ( 
    device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient(patient_id), 
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    activity_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
    heart_rate INT NOT NULL, 
    steps_count INT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE fitness_plan ( 
    plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient(patient_id), 
    plan_description TEXT NOT NULL, 
    calories_goal INT NOT NULL, 
    duration_days INT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE activity_data (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    activity_date DATE,
    steps_count INT,
    calories_burned DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fitness_plan (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    plan_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE activity_levels (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    time TIMESTAMP,
    steps INT,
    calories_burned FLOAT,
    device_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES wearable_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fitness_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    plan_description TEXT,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE plan_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    progress_date DATE,
    progress_percentage FLOAT,
    plan_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES fitness_plans(plan_id)
);
